articles.author: Tsvetana Paraskova
articles.title: Russia Says Europe Will Struggle To Replace Its Oil Products - OilPrice.com
articles.description: Russia's deputy prime minister believes Europe will struggle to replace Russian oil products and fuel and will probably ask for exemptions
